vote.title: An ordinance abandoning a portion of an alley to HIC XIV Limited Owner, LLC, the abutting owner, containing approximately 2,882 square feet of land, located near the intersection of Harwood and Hunt Streets; and authorizing the quitclaim; and providing for the dedication of approximately 1,487 square feet of land needed for street right-of-way - Revenue: General Capital Reserve Fund ($868,930.00) and General Fund ($20,000.00), plus the $20.00 ordinance publication fee
vote.description: An ordinance abandoning a portion of an alley to HIC XIV Limited Owner, LLC, the abutting owner, containing approximately 2,882 square feet of land, located near the intersection of Harwood and Hunt Streets; and authorizing the quitclaim; and providing for the dedication of approximately 1,487 square feet of land needed for street right-of-way - Revenue: General Capital Reserve Fund ($868,930.00) and General Fund ($20,000.00), plus the $20.00 ordinance publication fee
